Html:
Is it possible to make the spacing of the new paragraph tag the same as the spacing of a new line?

What I mean by that is when you press enter it will skip ahead 2 lines. I want it to skip only one line, same as if you press shift + enter (while still having the same functionality as just enter).

I think in Word the default is 2 lines for a new paragraph as well. Is it possible to make it like Outlook so it's just one line for a new paragraph?

 

Thanks
